name: Seedvilization
description:
In a world where humanity has collapsed, only ruins of a devastated
world are left.

Arid rocks, tempestuous winds and sterile goo have almost destroyed all
life on earth.

But a new cycle of life is beginning. Seed by seed, the most resistant
plants are reflourishing the land.

Help to create a new biosphere by building fragile and intricated
vegetal contraptions that will help the earth to blossom again.
